definition: 4th note in pentatonic scale 五音[wu3 yin1], roughly sol/see also 徵|征[zheng1]
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: Female citizens may be recruited for active service according to the army's need in accordance with the preceding paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 根據軍隊需要，可以按前款規定徵集女性公民服現役。

sentences.english: The exposition will unfurl 2008 Olympic Landscape Sculpture Designs Contest Selected Artworks Exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 2008奧運景觀雕塑方案徵集大賽入選藝術精品展。

sentences.english: Our company reserves right of final interpretation of this solicitation.
sentences.chinese: 我公司對本徵集活動保留最終解釋權。

sentences.english: A sergeant went from door to door requisitioning bullets for the men.
sentences.chinese: 一名中士挨家挨戶地給戰士們徵集彈藥。

sentences.english: Also when we collected the signatures, people helped us spontaneously.
sentences.chinese: 我們徵集簽名的時候，他們都自發來幫助我們。

sentences.english: Next, they enlist the assistance of the local computer geek on staff.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，他們會在當地職員中徵集計算機極客的協助。

sentences.english: Question 27: Can the medium and long term plan of railway network involved in the 《Soliciting Documents》be provided?
sentences.chinese: 可否給出《徵集文件》中涉及的中長期鐵路網規劃？

sentences.english: Tens of thousands of them, like Mrs. Young, were asked for specimens.
sentences.chinese: 他們中的數萬人像楊女士一樣被徵集了唾液樣本。

sentences.english: Claudius the Cruel was having a difficult time getting soldiers to join his military leagues.
sentences.chinese: 君克勞迪亞斯難以徵集兵源補充自己的軍隊。

sentences.english: They were soliciting signatures in every street for the sports.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲這次運動會四處徵集簽名。

sentences.english: I have another good news to tell you. The organizers are recruiting the volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 我還有個好消息要告訴你，主辦方正在徵集志願者呢。

sentences.english: The first chapter traces the emergence of "Folklore Movement" to its incorporation into Chinese Studies.
sentences.chinese: 首章論述歌謠運動從發起徵集到併入國學的基本脈絡。

sentences.english: Proxy solicitations have a so called double-edged sword effect.
sentences.chinese: 委託書徵集對公司治理具有“雙刃劍”效應。

sentences.english: She went from house to house collecting signatures for her campaign.
sentences.chinese: 她挨家挨戶爲自己投身的運動徵集簽名。

sentences.english: The army requisitioned the village for army provisions.
Robot fish could one day be enlisted for undercover science missions.
sentences.chinese: 機器魚有一天，被徵集服現役臥底科學任務。

definition: to auction/auction sale/to sell at a reduced price
specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
carefully chosen/handpicked/best of the bunch/choice (product)/concentration (mining)/to concentrate/to winnow
to collect/to compile/to converge/also written 彙集|汇集[hui4 ji2]
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
